content.text: PEORIA -- Doug Gaa has been promoted to Chief Deputy at the Peoria County Sheriff 's Office , replacing Joseph Needham who retired Thursday after 40 years in the Sheriff 's Office . Gaa , who has served with the Sheriff 's Office since 1993 , previously served as a patrol deputy , community police officer , patrol lieutenant and most recently as an undersheriff supervising Peoria County Courthouse security . In his new role , Gaa is responsible for overseeing all aspects of the Peoria County Sheriff 's Office operations , answering directly to Sheriff Brian Asbell . " He has done outstanding work in every position he has been in throughout the last 26 years , " said Asbell of Gaa . " Chief Needham asked for a quiet farewell , which we respected . However , he will be greatly missed . His guidance over the years was invaluable . We wish him all the best in retirement , " said the sheriff .
